question: [File: state-sync/storage-service/types/src/responses.rs] [TryFrom for (TransactionOutputListWithProofV2, LedgerInfoWithSignatures)] [V1/V2 conversion safety] Can the conversion from V1 to V2 drop important proof data or signatures? (High)
